activities: We use Non-Personal Information and Personal Information to notify you of new products or services, to send service notifications, to customize the advertising messages and content you see, to fulfill your requests for products and services, to improve the AdSignals website and to provide more relevant products, services, and advertisements on or through the AdSignals website. We may combine the data that we collect directly from you with data from other sources to improve the quality of the AdSignals website and to deliver targeted advertising messages on or through the AdSignals website.
recoursemech: AdSignals has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU Safe Harbor, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus. If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint, or if your complaint is not satisfactorily addressed by AdSignals, you may contact BBB at http://www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints.
